item.description:
They are holding 20 tickets for our group for the performance on Friday night, May 30th, at 8:00 pm at $30.00 per ticket, usually $60.00
Interested people can call the Group Sales ticket office at 978-232-7202 and reference my name (Jill) and the Merrimack Group. They will hold these seats until Friday, May 24th. People can call and pay directly at the group sales number...
The production runs 2 hours 50 mins. Suggestions are welcome for a place to go after if anyone is interested.

NSMT is thrilled to produce the New England Regional Theatre Premiere of Mel Brooks' THE PRODUCERS, winner of 12 Tony® Awards including Best Musical. That is more Tony® Awards than any other show in Broadway history.

Based on the hit 1968 film, this Mel Brooks masterpiece is the story of a washed-up Broadway producer and his timid accountant who hatch a scheme to get rich quick by producing a sure-fire flop. It's a comic tour-de-force that spoofs the big, old-fashioned Broadway musical while paying tribute to it at the same time. The Producers, originally directed and choreographed by Susan Stroman, will leave you laughing out loud!
Book by Mel Brooks & Thomas Meehan.
Music & Lyrics by Mel Brooks.

North Shore Music Theatre - HOME
item.how_to_find_us: Jill and Chuck our organizers will meet you in the lobby. A block of seats are being held.
item.why: Fun people and discounted seats..thanks Jill!!

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: The Producers at North Shore Music Theater
